name: SUO
description:
This game was made by a group of 16-year-olds, the project started in a program called "Fusion Jeunesse" in partner with Ubisoft CODEX. The game won 3 prizes at the final event: visual cohesion, soundtrack, and environmental construction. Also, an important member of the Ubisoft company told us: "Your game is of university level". Glad of the prizes and feedback, we decided to finish the game and publish it.

Stephcraft : https://stephcraft.net

Sy-Klop BEATZ : @sy_klop_beatz
